name: Turbo Laps
description:
Game a Week prototype 10 based on the theme of "multiplayer". Players can choose their car to race with up to 10 friends and see who finishes 3 laps before everyone else does! Or race on a wide open map to see who manages to reach the end.

Instructions
Driving --------------- W A S D / Up Left Down Right

Brake ----------------- Space

Hand Brake --------- Left Shift

Reset ----------------- R

Created by Amit and Ken.  

NOTE: We do not own any of the assets/songs used & the rights belong to their respective owners. This was created purely for educational purposes.

Songs Used:

Forza Horizon 5 Menu Music Guitar Cover: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S1pI3jnQoJY

Paradise City: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PS3zuN_jrAU

R5 - Pass Me By: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lVe6SEH9IsM
